resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Joining Together to Fight Gun Violence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zur Kampf-Waffengewalt zusammen verbinden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Se joindre ensemble à la violence de pistolet de 
combat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Juntar junto à violência de injetor da luta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unendosi insieme alla violenza di pistola di 
lotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να ενώσει για να παλεψει μαζί τη βία πυροβόλων όπλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ensamblar junto a la violencia de arma de la 
lucha</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of this lesson is to engage students in meaningful dialogues on the issue of gun violence and to explore avenues that could lead to changes in our society. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck dieser Lektion ist, sich Kursteilnehmer 
in den aussagefähigen Dialogen auf der Ausgabe der Waffengewalt zu 
engagieren und Alleen zu erforschen, die zu Änderungen in unserer 
Gesellschaft führen konnten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de cette leçon est engager des étudiants 
dans des dialogues signicatifs sur la question de la violence de 
pistolet et d'explorer les avenues qui pourraient mener aux 
changements de notre société.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade desta lição é acoplar estudantes 
em diálogos significativos na introdução da violência de injetor e
explorar as avenidas que poderiam conduzir às mudanças em nossa 
sociedade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questa lezione è di agganciare gli 
allievi nei dialoghi espressivi sull'emissione della violenza di 
pistola ed esplorare i viali che potrebbero condurre ai cambiamenti 
nella nostra società.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός αυτού του μαθήματος είναι να συμμετεχθούν οι
σπουδαστές στα σημαντικά διαλογικά παράθυρα στο ζήτημα της βίας 
πυροβόλων όπλων και να εξερευνηθούν οι λεωφόροι που θα μπορούσαν 
να οδηγήσουν στις αλλαγές στην κοινωνία μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de esta lección es contratar a 
estudiantes a diálogos significativos en la aplicación la violencia 
de arma y explorar las avenidas que podrían conducir a los cambios en
nuestra sociedad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205257</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
